text:
Renewable energy is energy that can be collected from ressources which are naturally replenished like sun, wind, waves. This term exist in human timescale and depends of the consommation speed and renews speed.
 Thanks to this energies, we can finish to use fossil fuels and devellop economic and politic indenpendance of some countries with exports. Fosill fuels becomme more and more expansive and this can have bad consequences between countries.
 The use of renewable energies can improve and decrease the environnemental impact with wind power or photovoltaics. Biomass and fuels contribute to CO2 emissions in the air and cosume a lot of water but with other methods like wind we can keep and conserve water. Thanks to that, the air pollution decrease and CO2 emissions too.
Renewable energies are  good possibilities to improve environnement. But for the moment, they are a bit expansive to be use everyday by everybody.
 Many countries try to use it and I think we need to talk more about it to people. We need to put forward the pollution problems and sensitize people to the impact in the environnement and soon to us.
 Before use renewable energies, we need to educate people and inform them to the possible consequences of the big energies and ressources consommation we are making. It's important to change our life habits and respect more environnement. It 's also important to put forward local producers to reduce transport pollution.
 The daily life changes can have a big and positive impact if everybody make it and decide to have better habits.
 And later, it will possible to use renewable energy to complete this change. But use only this type of energy is not enough.
 Those energies can be more use by compagnies and some of them can reject less CO2 emissions or waste for examples.
 In my mind, renewable energies must be combine with serious daily life questionning
